h2. Settings

{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal">
<fieldset>

<!-- Form Name -->
<legend></legend>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Name</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="Mr. Test" class="input-xlarge">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">E-mail</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="mrtest@cloudscalers.com" class="input-xlarge">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Password input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="passwordinput">Password</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="passwordinput" name="passwordinput" type="password" placeholder="xxxxxxx" class="input-xlarge">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Multiple Radios (inline) -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="radios">Credit Card Type</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-0">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="Visa" checked="checked">
      Visa
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-1">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Mastercard">
      Mastercard
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-2">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-2" value="American Express">
      American Express
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-3">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-3" value="Diners">
      Diners
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Credit Card Number</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-x765" class="input-xlarge">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Expiration date</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="dd/mm" class="input-mini">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">CCV</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="" class="input-mini">
    <p class="help-block">3 or 4 digits on the backside</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Button -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="singlebutton"></label>
  <div class="controls">
    <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>
  </div>
</div>

</fieldset>
</form>
}}
